FLASHcoin is the innovative crypto coin based on Bitcoin/Litecoin technology that offers faster and cheaper transactions than comparable coins.  All coins were given away to the community in early 2017 and people are actively developing applications that take advantage of the many benefits FLASHcoin  The web site for the community is at flashcoin.io

Alphabit  Digital  Currency  fund  is  an  actively  managed  cryptocurrency fund  for  professional  investors. The fund is domiciled in the Cayman Islands, and is registered with the Cayman Islands Monetary Authority (CIMA).We use  a blend of manual  and  automated  trading strategies,  as well  as investing in  a portfolio of Initial  Coin Offerings (ICO), to generate returns over and above the performance of Bitcoin.  As  Alphabits  target  is  to  achieve  this  outperformance  with  less  volatility, not  only  do our clients  see  much higher returns, but we only take a performance fee if we achieve this on a risk adjusted basis, as measured by the Sortino ratio.

Safe Cash is the next generation payment technology that helps the internet make more money.  Using state of the art blockchain technology, Safe Cash increases security and efficiency for banks and significantly lowers friction for merchants and consumers.  Our new loyalty product, FLASHcoin, is designed to help developers hit the ground running with blockchain techology with a cloud based solution and set of tools to help them earn more from their efforts.
Unseen is a platform for private and secure communications using web sites and applications.   (https://unseen.is)

Shen Yun brings 5,000 years of Chinese culture to life on the stage.  It's a profound show with deep meaning for everyone who sees it.  I have volunteered every year to help with the marketing for this non-profit organization, both online and in local malls since 2009.I hope everyone reading this page gets a chance to see this magnificent show.  I highly recommend it.

September 29, 2012, Ryan 'Fritz' reported directly to Chris

Chris gave me my start on the Internet, for which I will always be grateful. He was a terrific boss: he demanded fast and high-quality work, for sure, but once he hired me to handle the writing and reviews he let me choose my own people and do it my own way.  When he sold the company to Lycos he made sure to give me and many of my Point writers a leg up there as well. I salute and recommend him.

Andy Steuer
CEO/Co-Founder of Helpware / Entrepreneur / Investor
March 18, 2008, Andy reported directly to Chris

Chris is truly one of a kind.  His vision for how to spot a trend, combined with his instinct for acting on his vision is what leadership is all about.  Chris has an innate ability to rally the troops like no other by sharing his vision while it becomes yours as well.  Chris creates a fun, productive environment for those on his team to push themselves in new ways that collectively produce truly outstanding results, which is how the team at XOOM.COM rose to the occasion to pioneer user generated content and direct marketing on the Web.  I'll never forget the victory laps we'd run at the end of each week celebrating the successes we all achieved at XOOM.COM.  I've always enjoyed working with Chris, and look forward to the next time we work together again.

Alan Gunshor
Entrepreneur (focused on Tokenized Cryptocurrencies and Blockchain Infrastructure)
September 22, 2015, Chris managed Alan directly

Alan is a top quality Silicon Valley executive with excellent marketing savvy -- I've known him and worked with him for 20 years, from Netscape to Safe Cash.  His wheelhouse is in managing rapid development and creating an ecosystem of partners, investors and developers.  That's not always easy to build when your product vision isn't fully formed yet and you are still trying to get to the right answer quickly.  Alan has been through this many, many times and brings a wealth of experience to the game that can get your development program off the ground.

summary: I'm a serial entrepreneur who has created companies with over $7 billion of market capitalization during a 25-year career.  I've been part of the Lycos’ IPO team, was founder and CEO of Xoom.com (IPO: 1998), and was CEO of NBCi, formed by the merger of Xoom.com and Snap.com, in addition to other companies in digital media and payments, such as Wine.com and Unseen.   Currently, I am working on several very interesting blockchain related projects, and helping the Alphabit Fund.Please note to people connecting with me:  I accept all connections, except from obvious scammers.  Due to time constraints, I may not have time to respond to every pitch sent to me.  I'm looking forward to hearing from everyone, wherever you are in the world.  If you have ICO or cryptocoin pitches, you are welcome to send them to me and I will get the best ones in front of the right people at Alphabit Fund for review.
name: Chris Kitze
title: Chairman at Alphabit Digital Currency Fund
